watering.isInPast: this is already in the past, so you cannot change your decisions
watering.hintNoPeriod: the planing process has not yet started
watering.noRecruits: unfortunately no one is assigned to water the plants

assignment.confirmRemoveContent: if you cancel your assignment, other gardeners will get a request for substitution

wizard.sorryNotYetPlanned: Sorry, currently not in a planning phase, please come again later
